channel.title: Rules on flunkyball.beer
channel.description: Recent content in Rules on flunkyball.beer

item.title: Flunkyball Rules
item.description: Disambiguation A match is one whole game of Flunkyball. A lap is a throw from every player still remaining in the game. A decider is a minigame that results in a winner and a loser. A pitch is the area and markings where the match is played. Team The game is played by two teams. A team consists of at least one player. The teams may only differ one in size.
